#Load data
```{r}
library(tidyverse)
library(gmodels)
addata<-read.csv('advertising.csv')
addata %>% glimpse()
str(addata)

#separate date and time
addata_1<-addata
addata_1=addata_1 %>% separate(Timestamp,c('date','time'),sep =' ' ) %>% separate(time,c('hour','minute','second'),sep=':')
addata_1=addata_1 %>% mutate(Time_of_day=case_when(hour<12~'Morning',hour<18~'Afternoon',TRUE~'Evening'))
str(addata_1)

addata_1$Clicked.on.Ad<-as.factor(addata_1$Clicked.on.Ad)
addata_1$Time_of_day<-as.factor(addata_1$Time_of_day)
str(addata_1)

```
